class vizasm.analysis.asm.cpu.objcruntime.IVarRefLookup.IVarRefLookup[source]¶

Bases: object, vizasm.analysis.asm.cpu.Resetable.Resetable

Models the instance variable cache of a class.

A dictionary helper for the IVar class to look up the ivar_ref from an ivar_class.

Cause every time a message is sent to an ivar_ref like Object3, an ivar_class like AppDelegate.obj3 is read,

but this will create a new ivar_class and the ivar_ref has to be looked up in this class.

The ivar_ref will be stored after a VarAssignment is read which links to an ivar_class. At this moment, the ivar_ref

seems to be stored in the return register.

Parameters:

__ivar_ref_dict: dict :

dictionary to look up the ivar_ref from an ivar_class (see IVar)

Methods

get_ivar_ref(ivar_class) Get the ivar_ref for the ivar_class
get_ivar_ref_dict()
reset()
set_ivar_ref(ivar_class, ivar_ref) Link ivar_class to ivar_ref
set_ivar_ref_dict(value)

class vizasm.analysis.asm.cpu.objcruntime.ObjectiveCRuntime.ObjectiveCRuntime(cpu, superclass_dict)[source]¶

Bases: object, vizasm.analysis.asm.cpu.Resetable.Resetable

Models the objective-c runtime.

It keeps track of seen instance variables and their values and handles calls to super as well as all msgSend stuff (objc_msgSend).

Parameters:

_cpu: Cpu :

_ivar_lookup: IVarRefLookup :

Dictionary helper to look up instance variables

_superclass_dict: dict<ObjcClass, ObjcClass>, optional (default {}) :

dictionary holding the base classes of the classes

create_and_store_method_selector_arguments(method_selector)[source]¶

Create and store the arguments for the method_selector. There will be as many arguments created as the Selector needs.

Parameters:

method_selector: Selector :

the Selector describing the method that is currently being read by the Cpu
Raises:

SelectorOverloadedException :

if selector has more arguments than it needs
static create_method_selector_arg(number)[source]¶

Create a method argument for the current method selector. See method_selector. The method arguments are stored as instance of MethodSelectorArgument named with the suffix Cpu.METHOD_ARGUMENTS_PREFIX.

Parameters:

number: int :

the number to append to the argument name
Returns:

MethodSelectorArgument :
get_cpu()[source]¶
get_current_selector_check_sel_type(objc_msgSend_stret=False)[source]¶

Return the current selector and check the type of the selector. If not correct, raise ObjcRuntimeSelectorWrongTypeException.

Parameters:

objc_msgSend_stret: bool, optional (default is False) :

indicate an objc_msgSend_stret
Returns:

selector: Selector :

The selector currently stored in the register specified by selector_registers.
Raises:

ObjcRuntimeCouldNotGetSelector :

raised if the value of the selector register could not be detected

ObjcRuntimeSelectorWrongTypeException :

raised if the type of selector is not Selector
